title.narrative: 2019 Innovation Fund Project - Fishing for Work

description.narrative: The overall goal of the Fishing for Work pilot project is address youth unemployment in the area around Lake Victoria in Kenya by engaging youth in collaboratively addressing challenges in the fishing value chain by identifying and designing solutions through fish hackathons, then helping youth bring their ideas to life by connecting them to networks, opportunities and other resources in the fishing sector using a value chain hub coordination model.
